text: when using `?hsDebug=True` I am not getting the usual dev info output anymore. Has this changed to something else?
Did someone ever tried implementing PWA on their HubSpot website and would like to share some info about how they did it?
Sir, seriously, one channel would have been enough.
<@U014A8JD9DH> Wanted to make sure I reach out to all kind of people with diff answers :slightly_smiling_face:, you can skip my message !

hey guys, i'm trying to find the option to connect my Twilio account with my sales professional account but can't find it. I followed this article <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/calling/HubSpot-calling-minutes> and it says it should be in settings --> sales --> calls but don't see it there

Hi <@U014YM2UQTY>, while we totally understand wanting to make sure your message has as much visibility as possible, channel spamming is against our code of conduct on our developer slack. Please refer to our code of conduct on for more information: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#channel-spamming>

For now I am going to remove your post in other channels and keep this one here in General for folks to respond to. If you ever have questions on the best place to ask your question, please feel free to post in <#C22PU4LV8|general> and folks in the slack can provide direction for you.
